mapper.select: select b.id,b.year,b.pname,b.constructionPlace,b.economyType,b.content,b.beginDate,b.endDate,b.beianNo,b.beianDate, b.filePath,b.scanFilePath,b.change,b.sourceProjectId,b.remark,b.applicant,p.productName,b.changedDates,b.projectNo, b.accountName,b.accountPassword,b.powerUsed,b.energyUsed,b.equipmentCnt,b.equipmentQuantity, bs.totalAmount, bs.totalAmountTax, bs.amount, bs.amountTax, bs.equipment, bs.equipmentTax, bs.initWorkCapital, bs.initWorkCapitalTax, bs.construction, bs.constructionTax from t_beian b left join t_beian_summary bs on bs.beianId = b.id and bs.companyId = b.companyId left join t_product p on b.productId=p.id where b.companyId=#{companyId} and b.id=#{beianId}
